transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hi sir, good afternoon. Neha baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, aapne phone kiya tha sir abhi 9696 se na, meri baat hui thi aap.
Customer: Wo mujhe kuch, mujhe kuch requirement thi wo main dekh raha tha aapke paas, kaise lag gaya.
Executive: Sir wo actually kya hota hai na jab aap requirement dekhte ho to 9696 se call jata hai to aapka jo catalog hoga wo mere andar hai na to call mere paas hi aata hai hamesha.
Customer: Mujhe kuch matlab dekhna hoga to wo call bhi aapke paas jayega?
Executive: Jaise 96 pe agar call chala jata hai na to wo aata hai. Aapko dekhna kya tha waise? Mere khyal se manufacturer chahiye the na aapko kisi product ke?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ye, haan kis product ke chahiye?
Customer: Laminated woman bag aate hai na woman bags.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: To aap ek kaam kar sakte ho jaise google pe jaate ho na to waha pe aap likh sakte ho manufacturer of jo bhi ye list bag hai wo search karke.
Executive: Contact number nahi aa raha na unka.
Executive: Jab aap waha pe jaate ho na to waha pe unka PNS number likha hota hai jab manufacturer karke search karte ho aap.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To waha pe jab unka number PNS wala hi hota hai. Ruko main search kar deti hu. Koi product ka naam batao aap mujhe.
Customer: Ek minute dijiye.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Ab product ka naam aap jaise laminated paper bag likhenge na, ye chahiye.
Executive: Achha laminated, theek hai, ek minute. Ya phir second option.
Customer: Paper bag.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Isko customize bhi hona chahiye, na?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Kyunki hamari company ki branding hogi isme.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Second option mein hum plastic woman pack bags bhi kar sakte hai.
Executive: Achha. Ab yaha pe maine jaise search kiya hai na google pe laminated bag karke aur manufacturer likha hai, theek hai? To mujhe pehla page jo hai wo show hota hai IndiaMART ka to main waha pe IndiaMART ki directory pe land hui, theek hai? Ab waha pe mujhe bahut se aise client hai jo dikh rahe hai is particular line mein deal karte hai, theek hai? To aapne kya karna hai niche jaise koi bhi profile pe jaate ho na waha aata hai view mobile number, theek hai? To wo unka PNS number hota hai to aap waha ke through kar sakte ho. Main ek baar aapko screenshot share karu?
Customer: Haan, screenshot share kar do.
Executive: Ek minute. Ek baar sir whatsapp number batana aap ek baar mujhe apna.
Customer: Ye 82990.
Executive: 82990.
Customer: 81 6711.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Ye dekho maine aapko ek hi message kiya hai. Aur aise karke main na highlight kar leti hu aapko. GST hoga andar.
Executive: Haan jo upar likhe hote hai na jo manufacturer wale honge na jo dekho top clients ke roop ka dikh rahe hai na ye industrial leader ho gaya, leader supplier ho gaya ye IndiaMART pe deal karte hi hai to inka GST jo hota hai wo registered hi hota hai. To view mobile pe jab aap click karte ho to unka number aapko show ho jata hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur google pe waise. Screenshot. Maine bheja whatsapp pe sir. Main aapko thodi der me karta hu call hai na.
Executive: To sir main aapka ye concern pe close kar sakti hu na kyunki actually ye yaha pe 96 pe call kiya to mere side se aapke side se concern raise ho gaya hai.
Customer: Theek hai aapne, aapne mujhe ye bheja abhi isme kya keh rahe ho aap jo aapne round karke bheja call us. Dekho. Sabhi pe nahi aa raha na view number pe.
Executive: Jaise view number hota hai na waha pe click karna to aapko yaha pe aa jata hai call aur unka number aa jayega.
Customer: Achha theek hai, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan aur upar search kaise karna hai google pe pehle product ka naam aur manufacturer likh dena uske pehle page pe aapko IndiaMART ka directory karke aa jayega. Waha pe click karna ye sare clients aapko dikh jayenge koi bhi product aapne open karna hoga to.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, okay. Theek hai unka number mil jayega. To sir main concern close kar sakti hu na aapka?
Customer: Haan haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan aapke paas ek feedback aayega sir please wo feedback de dijiyega. Baki koi aapka jo ye catalog chal raha hai usme koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi abhi is time pe hisab wale mein?
Customer: Abhi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Theek hai rating ka kaisa chal raha hai PNS sold directing wale mein? Main thodi der baad baat karta hu aap se.
Executive: Theek hai chaliye theek hai main theek hai aap free ho jana main concern.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed manufacturer contact details.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to find manufacturer details.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- manufacturer, pns number, laminated bags, google search
